title: MagicPix Pro Camera Chromecast
summary: The most powerful camera app - Now with Chromecast. Control with Smartwatch.
developerAddress:
3075 E. Thousand Oaks Blvd
Westlake Village, CA 91362 USA
description: MagicPix Pro Camera Chromecast is simply the most powerful and innovative camera app that will be the first choice for 100s of millions of users around the world!  Completely redesigned SLR type user interface, Voice activated controls, Android Wear smart watch control for remote control of smartphone camera. Live Histogram display option, Burst mode, Exposure control, color effects!   Chromecast your pictures and videos to view on the big screen TV - Turn your old smartphone into a powerful security camera, baby monitor, or activity monitor!!   No Ads.-  Simple, uncluttered SLR camera type interface. Well designed icons that disappear to ensure maximum viewing area. Choose between Normal (NOR) or Professional (PRO) mode.-  Use your Android Smartwatch to remotely control your smartphone camera and view your pictures. Mind blowing feature that allows flash control, camera switching, video/photo switching remotely from your smartwatch!-  Chromecast your pictures and videos to a big screen Chromecast enabled TV or any device.  With our free LiveView Video Casting app, view the smartphone video live on a Chromecast enabled device.- Voice-activated control for your smartphone camera shutter, switching camera mode, video/photo etc.-  Better light performance:  Take better videos utilizing built in camera flash for improved lighting.-  Take pictures in HDR mode! -  Zoom with pinch control.-  Geotagging - capture geographic location on the pictures.	-  Autofocus:  Focus your pictures by clicking or tapping on the screen at the desired area.							-  Use a countdown timer including remote timer through smartwatch. -  Silent shutter mode.-  User friendly photo organization. Photos and videos are automatically classified into editable albums that can be edited by the user. Search and caption photos easily. Enjoy pictures in a slideshow.-  Many additional features:  Transform simple pictures or selfies into masterpieces using various professional quality photo editing modes, photo filters, white balance, color balance, sharpen and blur, photo frames. Instantly share using Email, Bluetooth, Google+, Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Google Drive, Dropbox, Instagram, Whatsapp and other apps that are installed on your phone.  Our strong team of developers is constantly optimizing the app and will respond to any bugs immediately.Find us onFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/MagicPix-Pro-Camera-HD/1552393085007474Twitter: https://twitter.com/procameo123Instagram: http://instagram.com/procameo123/Pinterest: http://www.pinterest.com/procameo/
descriptionHTML:
MagicPix Pro Camera Chromecast is simply the most powerful and innovative camera app that will be the first choice for 100s of millions of users around the world! Completely redesigned SLR type user interface, Voice activated controls, Android Wear smart watch control for remote control of smartphone camera. Live Histogram display option, Burst mode, Exposure control, color effects! Chromecast your pictures and videos to view on the big screen TV - Turn your old smartphone into a powerful security camera, baby monitor, or activity monitor!! No Ads.
- Simple, uncluttered SLR camera type interface. Well designed icons that disappear to ensure maximum viewing area. Choose between Normal (NOR) or Professional (PRO) mode.
- Use your Android Smartwatch to remotely control your smartphone camera and view your pictures. Mind blowing feature that allows flash control, camera switching, video/photo switching remotely from your smartwatch!
- Chromecast your pictures and videos to a big screen Chromecast enabled TV or any device. With our free LiveView Video Casting app, view the smartphone video live on a Chromecast enabled device.
- Voice-activated control for your smartphone camera shutter, switching camera mode, video/photo etc.
- Better light performance: Take better videos utilizing built in camera flash for improved lighting.
- Take pictures in HDR mode!
- Zoom with pinch control.
- Geotagging - capture geographic location on the pictures.
- Autofocus: Focus your pictures by clicking or tapping on the screen at the desired area.
- Use a countdown timer including remote timer through smartwatch.
- Silent shutter mode.
- User friendly photo organization. Photos and videos are automatically classified into editable albums that can be edited by the user. Search and caption photos easily. Enjoy pictures in a slideshow.
- Many additional features: Transform simple pictures or selfies into masterpieces using various professional quality photo editing modes, photo filters, white balance, color balance, sharpen and blur, photo frames. Instantly share using Email, Bluetooth, Google+, Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Google Drive, Dropbox, Instagram, Whatsapp and other apps that are installed on your phone.

Our strong team of developers is constantly optimizing the app and will respond to any bugs immediately.
Find us on
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/MagicPix-Pro-Camera-HD/1552393085007474
Twitter: https://twitter.com/procameo123
Instagram: http://instagram.com/procameo123/
Pinterest: http://www.pinterest.com/procameo/
comments: Can't see the pic im taking on my smartwatch so dont see the point of this app Not worth the purchase
Need advice How to add more color effects. I have only none.

Wow camera app. Much better than anything else out there. Love the way it lets me use my LG watch as remote. Nice update!! Loved the Chromecast feature from the photo gallery and pictures organization. Lots of great features - voice control, HDR mode, histogram, exposure control, color effects, burst mode, and smart watch control for Android wear!

Killer camera app with chromecast - love the smartwatch photo preview and nice professional icon layout Love the chromecasting feature. Quite innovative app.  Like the voice control update and the remote control feature with Android smartwatch.  RGB histogram, photo effects, continuous photos, HDR, exposure control and pinch zoom!  It got it all!
Please fix the gallery Its really buggy! Please just use the normal phone gallery and make a seperate gallery app for editing. Rest of app is perfect.
Something wrong with the operation. I'm using Samsung Grand Neo Android,but until now I can't using and change the ISO,shutter Speed and the Opening.
